title: Bug 33776Resistering TraverseListenter with Shell changes tabbing behavior.
description: 2.1 RC1 motif build.org.eclipse.help.ui.internal.ContextHelpDialog registers TraverseLisenter withShell.It changes behavior of "Tab" key.Without registerning, the key can beused to move focus around widgets on the control, when TraverseListener isregistered, using "Tab" moves focus until it reaches the shell and does notmove to the next widget.
